timeline.bodyText: I would suggest using String.isBlank or even StringUtil.isBlank to additionally ignore null.
timeline.author: cygnus-x-1

replies.bodyText:
@formalhaut69 I'd second what @cygnus-x-1 says with StringUtil.isBlank.
Side tracking a little and this is purely me sharing a tip I've learnt (from SQ) is in general if you have to compare a string with an object, putting the string to the left of the operation helps avoid an NPE - e.g. "Some Text".equals(someObject) 😄
replies.author: arcturus2
